applicant-name.name: BEIJING MINLI ENERGY STORAGE TECH CO LTD
北京民利储能技术有限公司

invention-title: Composite fused salt cold storage material and preparation method thereof
一种复合型熔盐蓄冷材料及其制备方法

abstract.p: The invention discloses a composite molten salt cold storage material and a preparation method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of cold storage materials, the composite molten salt cold storage material comprises the following raw materials by weight: 85-95 parts of modified water-based composite salt, 12-16 parts of functionalized expanded graphite and 10-20 parts of an initiator solution; the modifier and the functionalized expanded graphite are added, the modifier contains acylamino, hydroxyl and unsaturated double bonds, and the acylamino and the hydroxyl can form hydrogen bonds with binding water in calcium chloride hexahydrate and magnesium chloride hexahydrate on one hand, and can also form hydrogen bonds with hydroxyl in the functionalized expanded graphite on the other hand, so that the binding water in the calcium chloride hexahydrate and the magnesium chloride hexahydrate can be effectively improved. Unsaturated double bonds can be chemically bonded with the functionalized expanded graphite, the hydrophilic performance of the expanded graphite base material can be improved due to the existence of phenolic hydroxyl groups, acylamino groups, hydroxyl groups and ether bonds in the functionalized expanded graphite, the self heat-conducting property of the expanded graphite can be better exerted, and through the synergistic effect of the phenolic hydroxyl groups, the acylamino groups, the hydroxyl groups and the ether bonds, the heat-conducting property of the expanded graphite is improved. The thermal stability, the thermal conductivity and the cycling stability of the cold storage material are jointly improved.

本发明公开了一种复合型熔盐蓄冷材料及其制备方法，属于蓄冷材料技术领域，包括以下重量份原料：改性水基复合盐85‑95份、功能化膨胀石墨12‑16份和引发剂溶液10‑20份；本发明加入了改性剂和功能化膨胀石墨，改性剂中含有酰胺基、羟基和不饱和双键，酰胺基和羟基的存在，一方面能与六水氯化钙和六水氯化镁中的结合水之间形成氢键，另一方面，它们还能与功能化膨胀石墨中的羟基形成氢键，不饱和双键的能与功能化膨胀石墨发生化学键合，功能化膨胀石墨中中的酚羟基、酰胺基、羟基和醚键的存在能够提高膨胀石墨基材的亲水性能，更好的发挥膨胀石墨自身导热性能，通过它们的协同作用，共同提高蓄冷材料的热稳定性、导热性和循环稳定性。
